entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0094.9527] The element us-gaap:FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationExpenseRemainderOfFiscalYear with a value of 207,000 is used in the filing as is the element us-gaap:FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationExpenseYearTwo with a value of 414,000. However no value is provided for the element FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationExpenseNextTwelveMonths. If there is no value for year one but there is a value for the remainder of the year and there is a value for year two, then year one should either have a value of 0, or Year one should have the value for Year 2 of 414,000.
Period :2024-06-30 Unit : USD Dimensions:us-gaap:FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis=rhe:BedLicensesIncludedInPropertyAndEquipmentMember Decimals: -3
Rule Element Id:9527 Rule version: 26.0.9 - rhe-20240630.htm 3606

property.name: label
property.value: Finite Lived Intangible Assets Amortization Expense Remainder Of Fiscal Year

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0094.9527] The element us-gaap:FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationExpenseRemainderOfFiscalYear with a value of 9,000 is used in the filing as is the element us-gaap:FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationExpenseYearTwo with a value of 18,000. However no value is provided for the element FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationExpenseNextTwelveMonths. If there is no value for year one but there is a value for the remainder of the year and there is a value for year two, then year one should either have a value of 0, or Year one should have the value for Year 2 of 18,000.
